amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used to carry out activities in the Market Access Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to carry out section 203 of the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 (7 U.S.C. 5623) or to pay the salaries and expenses of personnel who carry out a market program under such section.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chabot amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 72 - 347 (Roll no. 368).
